(17/07/2008 13:53): cause of course 8859-1 is fine cypromis - (17/07/2008 13:53): but unicode isn't cypromis - (17/07/2008 13:53): this should be simpler continuum - (17/07/2008 13:59): BUILD FAILURE: XWiki Products - Enterprise - Functional XMLRPC Tests http://continuum.xwiki.org/continuum/buildResult.action?buildId=33557&projectId=257 continuum - (17/07/2008 13:59): BUILD FAILURE: XWiki Products - Enterprise - LDAP Functional Tests http://continuum.xwiki.org/continuum/buildResult.action?buildId=33558&projectId=259 cypromis - (17/07/2008 14:02): or it should be default unicode so that people can use whatever language they want :) cypromis - (17/07/2008 14:02): would make life faaaaaaaaaaar simpler jvelociter - (17/07/2008 14:09): cypromis: we (devs) had that discussion serveral time I think cypromis - (17/07/2008 14:09): and what was the argument against it ? jvelociter - (17/07/2008 14:09): to be honest, I don't recall what the outcome was, or what the potential issue would be cypromis - (17/07/2008 14:10): I want to create documentation wikis cypromis - (17/07/2008 14:10): or to use xwiki cypromis - (17/07/2008 14:10): I know that I will be using xwiki in opensolaris cause we will ahve it on the opensolaris.org site as it seems currently cypromis - (17/07/2008 14:10): all this stuff needs multilinguality cypromis - (17/07/2008 14:11): and unicode is the standard, no ? cypromis - (17/07/2008 14:11): :) jvelociter - (17/07/2008 14:11): we have running instances of XWiki in UTF-8 mode jvelociter - (17/07/2008 14:11): like myxwiki.org jvelociter - (17/07/2008 14:12): the documentation should be enough for such a setup jvelociter - (17/07/2008 14:12): about UTF being default, maybe browsing the dev list you'll find a discussion on this topic cypromis - (17/07/2008 14:38): because that might be an issue cypromis - (17/07/2008 14:38): maybe the instructions only work with mysql cypromis - (17/07/2008 14:38): and not with postgresql jvelociter - (17/07/2008 14:39): you have xwiki.encoding set to UTF-8 in xwiki.cfg ? cypromis - (17/07/2008 14:42): yes cypromis - (17/07/2008 14:42): going to do a reinstall vmassol - (17/07/2008 14:42): cypromis: haven't followed your discussion with jvelociter  but if you want UTF8 you need to read this: http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Encoding cypromis - (17/07/2008 14:42): I am trying that vmassol - (17/07/2008 14:42): (you need to configure your DB, Servlet Container and XWiki to UTF8 or it'll fail somewhere) cypromis - (17/07/2008 14:42): with postgresql and glassfish cypromis - (17/07/2008 14:42): and it fails cypromis - (17/07/2008 14:42): all my other glassfish apps do utf8 cypromis - (17/07/2008 14:43): xwiki seems to be more complex cypromis - (17/07/2008 14:43): :) vmassol -
